title: Universal Financial Access for the Poorest
description: In 2021, 100% of Austria's poorest 40% of the population aged 15 and above had access to financial institutions or mobile-money-service providers, showcasing a strong financial inclusion policy.

title: Minimal Losses from Theft and Vandalism
description: Austrian firms reported only 0.5% of annual sales lost due to theft and vandalism in 2021, indicating a secure business environment.

title: Efficient Logistics Performance
description: In 2022, Austria scored 4.3 out of 5 on the logistics performance index for timely shipments, reflecting a highly efficient logistics infrastructure.

title: Exceptional Maternal Health
description: Austria recorded a maternal mortality ratio of just 1 per 100,000 live births in 2017, highlighting the country's exceptional maternal healthcare services.
